subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chicago Coach Denis Savard received a contract extension through the 2008-9 season. He has been the team’s coach since November, when Trent Yawney was fired. He finished the season with a 24-30-7 record. General Manager Dale Tallon said he was impressed with Savard, a Hall of Fame player who spent much of his career with the Blackhawks.
